DBService::DBItemIterator

DBService::DBItemIterator Class Reference

#include <Apoxi/AddOns/SyncML/DBService.hpp>


Public Member Functions

virtual BOOLEAN Release ()=0

Detailed Description

Iterator for iterating over the items in a datastore.

Member Function Documentation

virtual BOOLEAN DBService::DBItemIterator::GetNextItem (  UINT32 &  item_id,
void *  item_data,
UINT32 &  item_data_length,
SyncMLItemMetaInfo *  item_meta_info = 0
)  [pure virtual]
 

Gets the item id, data, and meta information of the next item. Gives back the id of the next item in parameter item_id and the data in parameter item_data and meta data in parameter item_meta_info.

Parameters:
item_id[out] : The item id for the item.
item_data[out] : Pointer to the buffer for the item data.
item_data_length[in/out],: Input should be size of data buffer, output the actual length of item data.
item_meta_info[out] : Pointer to the meta information of the item. Maybe 0.
Returns:
TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

virtual BOOLEAN DBService::DBItemIterator::GetNextItemMetaInfo (  UINT32 &  item_id,
SyncMLItemMetaInfo &  item_meta_info
)  [pure virtual]
 

Gets the item id and meta information of the next item. Gives back the id of the next item in parameter item_id and meta data in parameter item_meta_info.

Parameters:
item_id[out] : The item id for the item.
item_meta_info[out] : Meta information about the data of the item.
Returns:
TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

virtual BOOLEAN DBService::DBItemIterator::HasNext (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Tests if there is a next item.

Returns:
TRUE if there is a next item, FALSE otherwise.

virtual BOOLEAN DBService::DBItemIterator::Release (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Releases the iterator and free any memory used.

Returns:
TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.
